website_summaries.verdict: This air freshener from Air Wick is an excellent “set it, and forget it” system that will keep a room smelling like lavender, cinnamon, or your personal favorite scent for months at a time between refills.
pros: Automatically sprays air freshener at regular intervals
Refills can last up to 60 days each
cons: You cannot set the dispenser to a timer
A refill will only last 60 days if you place the dispenser on the lowest setting

customer_reviews.title: Set and Forget
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my large bonus room where my cats tend to hang out. This is easy to set up and use. It keeps this room smelling fresh. You can also refill these with generic spray cans and it doesn't require using Air Wick brand refills. I've had it running for months on the same set of batteries. This is the best automatic sprayer that I have used and it works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but unscheduled.
customer_reviews.text: If you like this review, make sure to give it a thumbs up! This comes with the air wick automatic dispenser as well as two fragrances and tow batteries. The fragrances smell nice and the automator works with my glade dispenser. The only thing is that you cannot spray it as you want and it's apparently motion sensitive? But even at the most frequent setting, I cannot determine what the schedule is. Which is fine, but if you want the dispenser to spray at exactly a certain time frame, this is not the item for you. The room the dispenser sprays in is pretty small so I am uncertain as to how effective it would be in a bigger room.
customer_reviews.author: Victory

customer_reviews.title: Good smells and laughs
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps my home smelling fresh. I love the many scents I can choose from. Plus my Boyfriend accidently sprayed himself in the face with it so the laughs were worth the price. Sometimes you here it go off and it scares my big great dane so that's funny too. Does its job. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The scent is nice but the "new" dispensers are garbage. I ordered 2 sets. One never worked and the other worked but half of the spray ran down inside the dispenser and it stopped working. Though attractive and stylish they need to go back to the drawing board. New is not always better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant design and function
customer_reviews.text: Great for any office, sometimes lunch can provide lingering smells that would be unprofessional for a client to be welcomed to upon entering our office. This works very well for its purpose: occasionally spraying masking scents. The product does leave room for improvement like having a button to disperse fragrance at any time, rather than having to wait. A feature on other dispensers.
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: and it came with my Favorite Air Wick Scent "Summer Delight" so I just couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I was getting sick of my old design, Air Wick Sprayer, and wanted something a bit more sleek, but not hugely over priced, Found this Deal right here on Amazon, and it came with my Favorite Air Wick Scent "Summer Delight" so I just couldn't pass this up. I received product after a couple of days, and it works better then my last and as always that Summer Delight smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Works Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. Love the black instead of the blaring white everyone else uses. The scents that come with this one are nice. Medium strength and not overpowering, which is good because I get migraines. I've bought a few more refills here on Amazon when they were super cheap so I have enough refills to probably get me to the end of the year. I use it by the litter box and even in the living room (one room over) I can smell a whiff of it when it goes off. Good product. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Molly S.

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: I'm still confused about how often this dispenses with the different settings. They don't make this clear on the box. Also, I hate the scent of Summer Delights. I will have to get the linen and citrus refills. I like light scents and the scent this came with is nauseating. I'm going to put it out in my vestibule until the 2 cans it came with run out. It has the potential to be a 5 star product for me once I figure out the spray system and buy the right scents.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardine Cizmar

customer_reviews.title: Defective or possessed
customer_reviews.text: This device spontaneously combusted and literally flew off the shelf! Scared me like we had a ghost! It went directly into the garbage and I’m not messing with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries included but the cloying, chemical scent ruined it.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The overly strong scent made me cough and my throat tickles and feels wierd because of the hardcore chemicals bursting out in intervals. However, it was nice to get batteries included. But this horrible cloyingly scent is bad. I think I'd like another scent, but maybe. I'm a huge fan of this setup in theory. Also I hated that you're supposed to place it 5-6 ft high. If you have a ladder or shelf maybe but I had no idea where to put it! Worse yet, you can't hang it anywhere because no place on the canister holder to hang with a nail. Wierd. Also wish they had the black canister because I was only offered the white.
customer_reviews.author: lisa j

customer_reviews.title: May come in black OR white. Not what's picture
customer_reviews.text: The images and description gave me every reason to believe I would receive a white dispenser. I got a black one. Wasn't what I expected or wanted. Doesn't go with my decor and sticks out like a sore thumb #firstworldproblems. Naturally, you cannot return/exchange this because of laws prohibiting sending hazardous or flammable items in the mail. Minor detail, albeit annoying. I do love the summer delights scent. It's my favorite scent. Amazon was very helpful with my issue.
customer_reviews.author: It'sMe

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has timed settings for 8, 16, or 32 mins. I absolutely love that. This set smells amazing and I have had mine set on 16 mins for around a month now on constantly and just ran out. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: ChristiTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Well I like the concept. The first time it sprayed put I nearly jumped out of my skin while on the terlit. The color is not very flattering considering most bathrooms have light colors even white. But I couldn't find a value pack this cheap in a color that suited me...so I went with it, like any frugal cheap-o would. That said the scent is just meh. Not much of a deliver even on the highest setting. I'm eager to try out some different fragrances to see how it works out. All in all its nice ...gets the job done but the scent is very weak on this kit. Scoop up other fragrances
customer_reviews.author: GemmaStone

customer_reviews.title: THUMBS UP!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product way MORE than the plug-ins because it last longer! Assembling it is a bit tricky, so TAKE YOUR TIME! Otherwise you might assume it is defective or doesn't work properly... BUT THAT'S NOT TRUE!!! Keep working on getting the can lined up and the cover twisted on tightly and it will have your home smelling GREAT for months at the lowest setting! The only main issue I have is that Family Dollar have the exact one for $5 less!
customer_reviews.author: Montana Jai

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, everything works as expected. It would be 5 star but the backing that allows you the hang it on the wall should be a little better. My washing machine shakes a little bit and it made it fall off the wall in the bathroom. A standard screw held it up and I guess it just needs to be deeper design
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Oily mess!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought and placed in house and work. After a couple weeks we noticed what looked like we had a leak from the roof or somewhere. Come to find out it was a puddle of oil from the spray out of automatic air freshener. went and checked the others and all had oily residue on carpet/tile. What a waste of money, turned them off, now have 12 cans of refill. I am going to contact manufacture next, wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: george s moore

customer_reviews.title: not very effective
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 X 13 study is so loaded with furniture that we have no outlet available for for a plug in room deodorizer. We thought this battery operated room deodorizer would be perfect. We placed it on top of a bookcase about five feet off the floor. Set on the highest setting, you can hear it periodically puff the air freshener into the room. The problem is, sitting at a desk less than six feet a way, I can't smell any sent at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ken T.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works great and the price was great! It’ very easy to assemble and works as advertised. I like that you are able to adjust the frequency of the spray for the size of the room you will be using it in. I also think it’s a great value as it includes two cans of spray. I wish the dispenser came in more colors. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Trapasso

customer_reviews.title: Yes you can hang this unit
customer_reviews.text: I have read some reviews about not being able to hang this new unit on the wall because there was no way to do it. There is a cutout in the back which allows you to hang it on the wall. Ours is hanging in our rescue center. Works just as it should. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Try products as soon as you get them so you can have them replaced if broke
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great. The only thing is I occasionally buy products and don't use them right away. I used this product about a month later and found out that the container that houses the spray container come apart during the spraying of freshener thus, only spraying once until you screw it back together. I am past the time to ask for a replacement. But I should get one.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: These are great for around the house and especially in basements. I put a dehumidifier and this air freshner in my basement and eliminated the musty smells, in the summer. You do have to check them to see if the batteries are dying. The unit will not depress the can’s tip properly and the air spray will run down the outside of the unit, when the batteries get weak.
customer_reviews.author: CRL VA

customer_reviews.title: Maybe use in open environment
customer_reviews.text: Initially it is good. Easy to use, smell is okay. After several hours, the smell is so strong( lowest setting) and make some of us feel dizzy. We have to shut off it right away and open windows.
customer_reviews.author: LX

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. By husband would apend hours using room air freshener spray. Which doesn’t last the smell is gone within minutes. This lasts. I had an extra automatic sprayer in black.and, this pack came with 2 refills. Fits perfectly. And, now I have a white one. I use one upstairs. And a black one I use downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Wood

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Automatic sprayer did not work when I received it. So I thought maybe the batteries were old. I put new batteries in and it still doesn't work correctly. I I've tried all three different settings on the sprayer and none of them will work right. The tip of one of the freshener cans was broke. They say this item is none refundable so beware if purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: LDT

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apt. I have my kitty litter for my two cats in the hot water room. I put this in there on the wall to keep the smell away. It has done the trick, I can smell it through out the house. I love this. This was the same price as any store and the best thing is that I can buy off brand canisters that will fit this as well if I decided to take the cheap route. I am thinking about buying two more for our campground in the clubhouse for the winter time so it don’t smell musty.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Carter

customer_reviews.title: FART SMELL LOL
customer_reviews.text: Every time It sprayed I asked to my girls "did you farted?" ..then my girl said Mom is the Air wick. I didn't believe it so I waited for it to spray again yes. Smells like burning sweet plastic...weird and annoying. My Husband agreed it was not a pleasant smell. Wont get it ever again. Wish I could return and get another scent.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine

customer_reviews.title: Missing 1can of air freshener
customer_reviews.text: Received my package but it only came with 1 can of air freshener and it advertised it came with 2? Very misleading. And the sprayer does not work no matter what time settings you put it on tried 3 packs of new batteries I’d like an address to return this item and get a replacement or refund please
customer_reviews.author: carla w.

customer_reviews.title: It does not work
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews before I purchased this, I was thinking,maybe I will get one that works. I was wrong, this has not sprayed, one time, since I open the box and put the batteries in it. This is not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: djdeb

customer_reviews.title: The only scent my home needs!
customer_reviews.text: This comes with everything, two refills and even batteries the set up was quick and easy, I think this bundle is amazing for the price. The problem i had with other plug in fragrances was that after a day or two the scent would fade (bath & body works) but I've been using this for about 3 weeks now and i can still smell the scent like its brand new. I live in a studio and i placed my Air-wick in the bathroom and when it sprays i can smell it all the way in my kitchen. i absolutely love this and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for something that will actually make their home smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Hassle free & smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! You can choose how often you want it to spray, and there are multiple scents to choose from. On average, batteries need to be changed every other month when on longest setting.
customer_reviews.author: CS Coffing

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month or so...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month and a half or so. Changed the batteries and everything and it just quit all together. Looks like I’ll be switching to a glade one since that one seems to work unlike this one.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Purchase Again!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this air freshener. Instead of spraying UP into the air, the spray comes out horizontally, leaving an oily patch on the counter it's sitting on.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  AZ

customer_reviews.title: Turn it on and forget about it.
customer_reviews.text: We have used the wax melt scents for years. They plugged in and can overheat. The scent lasted about a day and you need to replace them. I've bought two of these the middle of March. Battery operated and the spray is still going. Great product! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bowles

customer_reviews.title: A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I gave this zero stars...the air freshener dispenser does not work.i attempted to contact the seller....and the message stated "NO REUNDS"...so I have a specific kind of air freshener can.....and nothing to dispense it with......A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Judy B

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Some people at work always destroy the bathroom...not anymore with this great invention! This little beauty blasts an amazing aroma into the air and diffuses the death stench that my co-workers lay upon the bathroom. Thank you for improving my workplace environment!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Received broken.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, item didn't work. Can't return it because of the "combustible materials." However that didn't stop them from shipping it to me, so go figure. Anyway, now I have two cans of air freshener and the only way I can disperse it is to wander around the house spraying it. So perhaps this should be under the Exercise category.
customer_reviews.author: Coutier

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It's simple enough and does what it's supposed to. Sometimes, it does not work though. I know the battery is fresh and the scent is nearly full, however, there are periods of time where it decides not to operate. I purchased 3 of them. Overall, gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Rubark Established 2014

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work long!
customer_reviews.text: We already own this exact same model for our living room, and LOVE IT. I ordered a 2nd one for my master bedroom 2 months ago, and it has stopped working. I purchase official Air Wick refills, I’ve changed the batteries, and I know it must be switched off when changing. The new one TRIES to spray, but doesn’t seem to be strong enough. I am very disappointed.. my older one is still going strong. My newer one is now broken and was more expensive. Once I’m out of Air Wick refills, I’ll be using a different system. Clearly the newer ones are not made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave 4 stars not 5 because it is initially confusing how to put the batteries in and set it up but now, its running and it actually smells pretty good. I also gave 4 stars not 5 because the only color available in this set is, you guessed it, black.Comes with dispenser, 2 full refill cans, and 2 new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: skababy69

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works as stated. The sprayer was easy to assemble and there are three settings.
customer_reviews.author: SusanTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic air freshener. It works well, day after day. It’s easy to set up and use. Just remember it takes batteries and needs to sit high off the ground. The holder also looks nice and blends well into the house. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tbrundrummer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal and i ended up ordering 4 to be able to have these set up in different rooms. Although this deal came with one scent, it's pretty easy to buy additional scents for each device. I love the fact that each room in my home has a different scent to experience. I would suggest these fully.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put together and get it going. The 2 cans that are included smell great! I wish the smell would last longer but it is still great!
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: The Air Wick Pure Freshmatic Automatic Spray Starter Kit doesn't discharged as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The Air Wick Pure Freshmatic Automatic Spray Starter Kit doesn't discharged as advertised . Checked batteries they all tested fully charge the refill cans work Amazon doesn't allow returns on the item.
customer_reviews.author: Herschel E. Everett, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Check your batteries.
customer_reviews.text: First time I have ever brought a set that didn't come with batteries. I was so disappointed. I had to go buy some. The produce is good. I'm getting some more, just going to make sure I have batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I got this one to use this one on a shared washroom and was expecting more from it but I’m not happy at-least so far because it didn’t solve my long existing problem. I find the refills to be costly as well.
customer_reviews.author: PA Amz customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay for a very small area.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the product,but I find the sprays weak in scent. It does drip a bit, so watch the surface you place it on. I leave it the bathroom and close the door to keep the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Elise J.

customer_reviews.title: doesnt spray as often as box says
customer_reviews.text: Product says the highest setting sprays every 15 seconds, but that is not true. We put on the lowest setting thinking it would spray every 60 seconds but it didnt spray at all. Maybe we have a damaged one but I wont be purchasing any more of this automatic spray,
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Finau

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent it lingers around my common area however it doesn’t last how it is advertised and it could have been a better decor if the device has a better design. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Will.ianah

customer_reviews.title: Good but does not last long enough
customer_reviews.text: Smells really great and the auto spray is a wonderful feature. Unfortunately this does not last enough to justify the pricing. I eventually got an essential oil diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: therealtimz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of spraying, not a lot of smell good..
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don't know what I was expecting but this product doesn't really scent a bathroom, even with the door closed. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: M-D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer dispenser works great. Wished I had got different scent only because I like a stronger fragrance. If you like a very light scent its perfect for you
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Defective product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 months, then stopped working. I taught the battery was dead, changed the batteries still not working. Very annoying as I have wasted 2 hours trying to fix this crap. “DON’T BUY”
customer_reviews.author: U o

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: At First I really liked it but after a month it just stopped working... I can hear the click that it makes to spray but it doesn't spray... And the bottle is full and i tryed changing the batteries to make it work it doesn't. Around the same time i bought a different brand and I'm having no issues at all with that one. Wish i would've bought 2 of the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Remember to turn it on and off!
customer_reviews.text: Tip: turn the machine off when you aren't using it because otherwise this runs out really, really fast. But when you remember to turn it on and off, it works very well. I don't like this scent it comes with, but it has other scents that smell much better. Pumpkin spice, for instance.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Rose

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this scent.
customer_reviews.text: This was not the scant that made me decide to buy this air wick spray, but it was what was readily available on Amazon as a starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was sent wrong color!
customer_reviews.text: In the picture it shows a white dispenser which I like but I was sent one in black which I already had other than that it was fast shipment and price was good.
customer_reviews.author: MONA

customer_reviews.title: Nice fruity and sweet smell
customer_reviews.text: Refill lasted less than a month, maybe because it will last that long only at the specific automatic setting to spray slower. But it nice though if you like fruity sweet smell, good for kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: D&R

customer_reviews.title: It does'nt work
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer mechanism is horrible. It only sprays a very small amount and the oil from the spray is on the can. What a waste of money. Not only is the sprayer bad but the scents are horrible too. Will stick with my Glade products.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal great smell i got two kids and my bathroom we love pur bathroom smelling great lol good to have thanks Amazon fast shipping 😇😍
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t taste so unsure about flavor. The scent is great. The spray works well
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: This is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!! Loved the smell although many disagree on the comments. I really enjoy it and love how it makes my home smell. I Loved how easy it was to put together. The smell really lingers and stays around. it’s GREAT . Recommend !!!!
customer_reviews.author: pamella peguero

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and place them in different rooms mounted on the walls. Love how I can set my own time for it to spray the scent rather than having to do it myself. I do wish that these came with a little bit more choices on scents
customer_reviews.author: Big Ron

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different scent!
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this smell at all. It leaves something like an after taste in the air that smells stale or something... the product works great though. I went out and bought the fresh cotton scent and it’s much better.
customer_reviews.author: Christin G

customer_reviews.title: Psssst!  Scent, anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Directions were difficult, especially those printed on the container. Batteries which are provided don’t have much juice—only lasted barely 24 days.
customer_reviews.author: Susan McGraw

customer_reviews.title: I just keep ordering these
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite smell out of all of the freshners. Recommend for light fragrance, not too overwhelming as some can be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. DISPENSER DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: and it isn' returnable. so I am warning you. you can buy the actual spray cheaper elsewhere, and worthless without the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie K

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: A do not worry Room scent. I have one of mine close to my kitties litter box. Another with a holiday scent in my foyer.
customer_reviews.author: Dena.

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I use this next to my cats litter and entrance the scent is so soft it makes my apartment smell good and it is automatic i like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: At first the scent smelled sweet from the bottle but once it actually sprayed it smelled so beautiful! My mom is very sensitive to strong scents and she isn’t bothered by this. It’s a lovely summer smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Babich

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent it smells amazing, i just wish the time setting was different, i want it to spray more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Ronisha

customer_reviews.title: Would be awesome if it worked properly
customer_reviews.text: I would be a huge fan of this product however after spraying automatically 3-6 times the device pops open & you have to set it back up. Again I would love this if it worked, maybe mine is broken. Maybe it’s user error
customer_reviews.author: Rachael M

customer_reviews.title: This is good for a small room
customer_reviews.text: This is good for a small room and the Summer delights freshness is great. The only issue is I can't pin down the cadence of spray - it's not regular. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashutosh Singh

customer_reviews.title: Scent awfully bad !!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my hallway and we didn't like the scent coming from the free refills , purchased new from stores and using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mangsko

customer_reviews.title: value for money
customer_reviews.text: good value for money make sure it makes a snapping noise when putting together and does come with two double A batteries
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Freshmatic #2 had the same issues as the first
customer_reviews.text: Works great until it starts making extra noises. You'll get a free good months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: Keep an eye on the battery life, if you notice the scent isn’t working it could be that and not the refill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this because I have two big indoor dogs. It keeps the living are clean smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S.

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work.first one I bought lasted 20 days ordered another one sprayed one time.do not buy.can't return why does Amazon let them sell??
customer_reviews.author: puhoooh

customer_reviews.title: Arrived one not working.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of this,one not working. Can’t be returned to Amazon. Other problem,can't hang on high wall,looks ugly.
customer_reviews.author: E.I.G.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to set up. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Great setup instructions on the product's box. It's a much improved product compared to the one a bought four years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bauer New York USA

customer_reviews.title: read reviews
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent hate the sprayer it dnt work i have new batteries turned lil switch on and its no good
customer_reviews.author: Reena

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: I used it during a time when many people would be over and it is wonderful because you can adjust it to different timing levels. It can auto spray very frequently or you can set it to spray at lengthier intervals.
customer_reviews.author: nik foss

customer_reviews.title: I really appreciate you again It was a bass
customer_reviews.text: Amazon I like my kit smell so good they kiss him to come in handy whatever things are order what the cat and near the smelly things that want a with the kit thank you so much Amazon go the best thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lamica McRae

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use would not recommend if not using for a very small tiny area. The smell does not longer or last at all. Glad works better with a better longer lasting scent. I forget its there half the time. Does what its supposed to do just not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Karmel_sutra

customer_reviews.title: Scents
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of the freshmatic dispenser. I really wish I could like this but it left an oily residue on the floor and the scent wasn’t a favorite. That and the scent didn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Rubiiquartz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact there are 3 settings, 5min, 15min, 30min. I've had it about a month and had to change the batteries only once because I have it set to 5mins. It's as described, lightweight, I love the smell, I love the style, I love the price... and I plan on ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Kryssy

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Its prefect i love it! And the scent i enjoy it! I love fruit smell! And yes!!! In the back it has a little hole where you could press it and it will spray again!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Low quality and smell was horrible
customer_reviews.text: The scent was horrible. I smelled like powder or something. I also bought glade and I’m glad I did. So much of a better fragrance. It stunk so bad that I will probably never buy air wick again.
customer_reviews.author: shinbly

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is lovely. We have it in the powder room and the scent reachers into the foyer and living room. It was a little tricky figuring out how to get it to work but now it’s working fine. Would be nice to know frequency of the sprays rather than just the strength.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kaner

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it. So far I’m happy with it. Very easy to refill and access the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing lasted a week. I thought it was the batteries Bc it seemed weak and couldn't spray anymore .. changed the batteries.. and still nothing. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Matty🚒

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worth it for the bathroom and it is battery operated, batteries included. I turn this off at night.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lorenzana

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser worked perfectly for a month. Then it automatically stopped working. I changed the spray, batteries etc. But the inside spring mechanism (similar to the one used for click pens) was flawed. For some reason the spring came loose after a month’s use. The dispenser was on a high shelf the entire time so it was not even touched for it to suddenly become damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Abha

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and this scent and air wick machine just has my room smelling so good and fresh! Everyone from staff to students love the smell ! Believe it or not my room is big and the smell goes around the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Fanny Cerezo

customer_reviews.title: Love what you get
customer_reviews.text: I loved this scent and wasn't able to find it at local stores on A regular basis. I have this set up for regular delivery. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Smell doesn’t last, oil on wall from it
customer_reviews.text: The smell doesn’t really last long and doesn’t range well, we have it in our small bathroom and it doesn’t really do much for the room, the smell goes away fast and it leaves oil marks on our wall from the distance it shoots.
customer_reviews.author: prakash pokhrel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of these. They work great. The smell is not over powering. I will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Rosenda Roadruck

customer_reviews.title: too strong even on lowest setting
customer_reviews.text: This product would be ideal for a larger sized home with ventilation where there is low traffic. It delivers fragrance quite strongly and frequently even in the lowest setting, so much so I can smell it in three different rooms in my condo. This summer fragrance is also not my favorite... it's quite potent and chemical than floral.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I have had these in my house for a few years and never had a problem with it until now. I bought this to replace one that had died of old age put the new one together and it won’t work. I need a replacement ASAP please
customer_reviews.author: SallyAnn1234

product_meta.title: Air Wick Pure Freshmatic Automatic Spray Starter Kit, (Gadget + 2 Refills), Summer Delights, Air Freshener, Essential Oil, Odor Neutralization, Packaging May Vary
product_meta.description: Air Wick Freshmatic Ultra Automatic Air Freshener fills your home with continuous, fresh fragrance. Each refill provides continuous fragrance for up to 60 days. The Freshmatic diffuser has 3 settings to achieve desired fragrance level. Enjoy the continuous freshness in your bathroom, living room, office or den. Get the confidence of knowing that your home is always welcoming and pleasurable for family and unexpected guests. Based on low setting.
feature_bullets: Neutralizes odors & continuously freshens the home
Provides up to 60days of continuous fragrance Based on low setting
Ideal for your living room, bathroom, bedroom, hallways, kitchens & office

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
